page.title: 18MY DAILY LIFE-MAYA BLOOR
page.content: I get up at 7am.My usual breakfast is Rice Krispies, toast and tea.I leave for School at 8.30am:the bell goes at 8.55.We have no uniform but we look nice in our own choices.We have Register,Prayers and return to the classrooms.I am in 9-11yrs class 3. Lessons always include Maths from 10-10.45,and English in one form or another.Dinner break is from 12.15-1.30pm and school finishes at 3.30pm .No afternoon break.In my own time I learn ballet, recorders and belong to a Drama Club.I read lots of books and enjoy playing in the woods. I have many friends but only one or two close friends.Often I have Shepherds Pie and Angel Delight for pudding. Hot Chocolate settles me for bed at 8pm(but I read till 9pm!)I have a cuddly teddy called Buffy to whom I tell all my secrets.He's older than me
